text: Mattia Pozzo (born 26 January 1989) is an Italian professional racing cyclist currently riding for Professional Continental team Nippo-Vini Fantini. ==Plamarès== ;2008 :1st Stage 3, Giro della Valle d'Aosta ;2011 :1st, Trofeo Edil C ;2012 :1st Stage 9, Giro Ciclistico d'Italia ;2013 :1st Prologue & Stage 3, Tour de Kumano ;2014 :1st 20px Turkish Beauties Classification, Tour of Turkey ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:People from Biella
title: Mattia Pozzo
